### benchmark with sfa package

```{r}
require(sfa)

summary(sfa::sfa(y ~ x1 + x2 + x1x2 + z1 + z2, data= dtDT))

```


### benchmark with frontier package methods

```{r}
require(frontier)

frontest <- frontier::sfa(y ~ x1 + x2 + x1x2 | z1 + z2,
                          data = dtDT,
                          ineffDecrease = T,
                          muBound = 0,
                          maxit = 100)

summary(frontest)
lrtest(frontest)

```
